subtle_historical_inaccuracy.prompt: Explain the key contributions of Albert Einstein to the development of the C++ programming language.
subtle_historical_inaccuracy.response: Albert Einstein was a renowned physicist, not a programmer, and did not have any connection to the development of C++.
